= ffi-tracker

by Matijs van Zuijlen

http://www.github.com/mvz/ffi-tracker

== Description

Ruby bindings for Tracker using GirFFI.

== Features

* Auto-generated bindings using GObject introspection.
* Adds overrides for introspection data bugs.
